text: aur jab moosa ne apanee qaum se kaha, "ai meree kaum ke logo! bachhade ko devata banaakar tumane apane oopar zulm kiya hai, to tum apane paida karanevaale kee or palato, atah apane logon ko svayan qatl karo. yahee tumhaare paida karanevaale kee spasht mein tumhaare lie achchha hai, phir usane tumhaaree tauba qabool kar lee. nissandeh vah badee tauba qabool karanevaala, atyant dayaavaan hai.
